alert.note: Alert for Haines Borough and Klukwan; Municipality of Skagway (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued October 12 at 9:30AM AKDT by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM AKDT THIS AFTERNOON THROUGH FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is possible. * WHERE...The following area, Northern Inner Channels. This includes the cities of Skagway, Klukwan, And Haines. * WHEN...From 4 PM AKDT this afternoon through Friday morning. * IMPACTS...Soils remain moist and excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, other low-lying areas and flood-prone locations. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Heavy rain will move into the region Thursday afternoon and persist into the overnight hours before tapering off Friday morning. Rain amounts will range from 2 to 3 inches with locally higher amounts at higher terrain. The heaviest rain rates are anticipated to move into the area in the early evening hours ranging from 0.15 to 0.30 inches per hour.
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop. Stay tuned to further developments by listening to your local radio, television, or NOAA Weather Radio for further information.

area.areaDesc: Haines Borough and Klukwan; Municipality of Skagway
